Title: Utilizing Deprecated Function From Library
Content:
The [`TokenRateLimiter` contract](https://github.com/scroll-tech/scroll/blob/ae2e010324506d52f30d1aa98b98cc3e44f8c501/contracts/src/rate-limiter/TokenRateLimiter.sol) is setting up its default admin role in the constructor using the [`_setupRole` function](https://github.com/scroll-tech/scroll/blob/ae2e010324506d52f30d1aa98b98cc3e44f8c501/contracts/src/rate-limiter/TokenRateLimiter.sol#L57). However, this function [has been deprecated](https://github.com/OpenZeppelin/openzeppelin-contracts/blob/v4.9.3/contracts/access/AccessControl.sol#L204).


To avoid potential future incompatibilities with OpenZeppelin's contracts library, consider using the [`_grantRole`](https://github.com/OpenZeppelin/openzeppelin-contracts/blob/v4.9.3/contracts/access/AccessControl.sol#L228) method instead.


***Update:** Resolved in [pull request #902](https://github.com/scroll-tech/scroll/pull/902) at commit [daae8c4](https://github.com/scroll-tech/scroll/pull/902/commits/daae8c438d4e246c304da9251e286668d6189bc6).*
